categories: Category:Starships of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Sith Lord Darth Azard used a Nune-class Imperial shuttle for his personal transport.
In 137 ABY, Azard dueled Imperial Knight Master Treis Sinde while Sigel Dare, Monia Gahan, Ronto and other Rogue Squadron members escaped Mon Calamari aboard Azard's shuttle.
